vclaim: Melania Trump made a sly reference to the Mussolini-era slogan "me ne frego" with her "I DON'T REALLY CARE DO U?" jacket.
title: Did Melania Trump’s Controversial Jacket Contain a Pro-Fascism Message?
subtitle: Some elements of a viral post about Melania Trump's jacket are factual, but there's no proof it referenced the fascist slogan "me ne frego."
author: Kim LaCapria
